item.title: Using nested maps in Terraform input variables
item.description: Here’s my working terraform file: variable "create" {description = "Whether to the resources" default = true }variable "config" {type = "map" description = "Instances to create (map of maps keyed on 'name')" }data "template_file" "config_instance" {count = "${length(var.config)}" template = "${element(keys(var.config), count.index)}" }data "template_file" "config_instance_type" {count = "${length(var.config)}" template = "${lookup(var.config[element(keys(var.config), count.index)], "instance_type")}" }data "aws_ami" "ubuntu" {most_recent = true filter {name = "name" values = ["ubuntu/images/hvm-ssd/ubuntu-bionic-18.04-amd64-server-*"]}filter {name = "virtualization-type" values = ["hvm"]}owners = ["099720109477"]# Canonical }resource "aws_instance" "instance" {count = "${var.
